name: k6-performance-testing
description: Performance testing framework to test Gitlab Issues API

scripts.test-smoke: k6 run -e test_mode=smoke  --out influxdb=http://localhost:8086/myk6db issuesApi.js -e token=glpat-Nm3o218N_GbNQWrQvoNb
scripts.test-load: k6 run -e test_mode=load  --out influxdb=http://localhost:8086/myk6db issuesApi.js -e token=glpat-Nm3o218N_GbNQWrQvoNb
scripts.test-stress: k6 run -e test_mode=stress  --out influxdb=http://localhost:8086/myk6db issuesApi.js -e token=glpat-Nm3o218N_GbNQWrQvoNb
scripts.test-soak: k6 run -e test_mode=soak  --out influxdb=http://localhost:8086/myk6db issuesApi.js -e token=glpat-Nm3o218N_GbNQWrQvoNb

author: Suhila Ahmed
